org.logicmill.util.concurrent

Interface ConcurrentHashMap.SegCountSpec

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ConcurrentHashMap.Buildable, ConcurrentHashMap.LoadFactorSpec
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ConcurrentHashMap.MapConfigBuilder
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConcurrentHashMap.MapConfigBuilderImpl
    Enclosing class:
    ConcurrentHashMap<K,V>

    public static interface ConcurrentHashMap.SegCountSpec
extends ConcurrentHashMap.LoadFactorSpec
    An object returned by an invocation of withSegmentSize() or withExpectedMapSize(). This interface constrains operations to ensure proper ordering of invocations in a chain, and supports methods that determine the number of initial segments in a map of the resulting configuration.
    Author:
    edgeofmagic

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setLoadFactor(float factor) 
      ConcurrentHashMap.LoadFactorSpec withInitCapacity(int capacity)

      • Methods inherited from interface org.logicmill.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap.Buildable

        build

    • Method Detail

      • withInitSegmentCount

        ConcurrentHashMap.LoadFactorSpec withInitSegmentCount(int count)
        Suggests a value for the number of segments created when a map is constructed. The value of count is adjusted, such that

           countadjusted = 2 ⌈log2 (count)⌉

        that is, to the smallest power of 2 greater than or equal to count, and further adjusted if necessary so that it lies in the range [2..n] inclusive, where

           n = 230/segSize

        where segSize is the segment size of the resulting configuration.

        Parameters:
        count - suggested number of initial segments in a map of this configuration
        Returns:
        object that constrains the subsequent operations in the chain to ensure proper invocation order

      • withInitCapacity

        ConcurrentHashMap.LoadFactorSpec withInitCapacity(int capacity)
        Suggests a value for the initial capacity of a map of the resulting configuration. This value is used to determine the initial segment count (initSegCount for this configuration, such that:

           initSegCount = 2 ⌈log2 (capacity / segSize)⌉

        and the resulting initial segment count is further adjusted if necessary so that it lies in the range [2..n] inclusive, where

           n = 230/segSize

        where segSize is the segment size of the resulting configuration.

        Parameters:
        capacity -
        Returns:
        object that constrains the subsequent operations in the chain to ensure proper invocation order

      • withLoadFactor

        org.logicmill.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap.Builder withLoadFactor(float factor)
        Suggest a load factor for the configuration. The resulting load factor will be constrained to be in the range [0.5, 1.0], inclusive.
        Specified by:
        withLoadFactor in interface ConcurrentHashMap.LoadFactorSpec
        Parameters:
        factor - load factor for maps of this configuration
        Returns:
        object that constrains the subsequent operations in the chain to ensure proper invocation order.

      • setLoadFactor

        void setLoadFactor(float factor)
